name: Real Crazy Bicycle Race: Extreme Traffic Ride
name_original: Real Crazy Bicycle Race: Extreme Traffic Ride
description:
Get your bicycle protection gears and prepare to ride the extreme bicycle race to showcase the dangerous daredevil stunts in Real Crazy Bicycle Race: Extreme Traffic Ride. The x-sport bicycle ride will test your bicycle BMX, mountain bike and sport cycle skills to the limit. Challenge the extreme bicycle stunts riders in heavy traffic conditions to dodge and win the super fast biker stunt rider title!
In this sport cycle stunt race Real Crazy Bicycle Race: Extreme Traffic Ride you will race among the best sports and mountain bike riders in the extreme city traffic conditions and weather conditions. Ride through the snow storm, sharp corners & turns, dangerous edges, jumps, avoid obstacles, crowded roads to win the extreme highway stunts races that you have not competed before.
So download this amazing bicycle ride Real Crazy Bicycle Race: Extreme Traffic Ride and challenge your friends and family to beat the best time finish. Wait is over for the xtreme sport bikers to show the thrilling riding skills on the extreme sports, mountain and BMX bicycles!
Game Features:
1) Super-Fast Bicycle ride races
2) Amazing 3D racing graphics & tracks
3) Easy User Interface & Controls
